Akatope 
 Alice Kariuki 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Once upon a time, there 
 
 lived a woman. 
 
 
 
 She always wanted a child. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The woman tok the best clay soil she could find. 
 
 
 
 She started to make a girl. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The girl who was made of 
 
 mud became a real human 
 
 girl. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The woman was very 
 
 hapy. 
 
 
 
 She named the girl 
 
 Akatope. 
 
 
 
 She loved Akatope very 
 
 much. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Akatope was warned by 
 
 her mother not to go out of 
 
 the hut. 
 
 She did not listen. 
 
 
 
 Whenever her mother was 
 
 not home, Akatope ran out 
 
 to play with other children. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 One day Akatope was out 
 
 playing with the other 
 
 children. 
 
 
 
 It began to rain hard. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The other children ran to 
 
 their huts. 
 
 
 
 As Akatope ran, her legs 
 
 started to disolve. 
 
 
 
 She hunched over and sat 
 
 down betwen bushes. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The other children told 
 
 their parents what had 
 
 hapened to Akatope. 
 
 
 
 They were very sad and 
 
 shocked. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 When the woman heard 
 
 what had hapened to 
 
 Akatope, she cried for 
 
 many days. 
 
 
 
 The vilagers tok another 
 
 litle girl to take the place 
 
 of Akatope. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 But that was not necesary. 
 
 A big surprise awaited the woman! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 10  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 One night, there was a 
 
 gentle knock on the dor. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 "Who could that be," the 
 
 woman wondered. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 12  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Akatope had come home. 
 
 
 
 She was tired and sick. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 13  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Akatope's mother sold 
 
 everything she owned. 
 
 
 
 She used the money to 
 
 treat Akatope. 
 
 
 
 Akatope grew up to be the 
 
 most beautiful girl in the 
 
 
 vilage.
